text:
The GlobalRequestProcessor mbeans of Tomcat 5.5.12 return zero valued 
statistics. Doing http request through examples, admin, and status 
application, the counters attributes allways return the value 0. The status 
page displays also zero values for the connectors.

Browsing the mbean with the Sun jconsole, I get the same result: the counters 
are zero.

This mbean worked correctly in former tomcat 5.5.9.
creator: francois.waeselynck@bull.net
william.barker@wilshire.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38726 ***
